data.message: Hi Facebook would it be possible for you to add a timeline-like feature on the messages? Would love it if I could search back old conversations by just clicking on the month instead of scrolling up and waiting for it to load forever.. ^_^ hope you read this and consider my suggestion. :)

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, Jairus. We're listening to all of the feedback we get from the Facebook community. If you have anymore suggestions please, let us know at: http://on.fb.me/1xWhT34  -Elissa
